description:
LEAVING THE MILITARY & TRANSITIONING BACK INTO CIVILIAN LIFE IS A CHALLENGING PROCESS: WHETHER YOU SERVED FOR 1 YEAR, OR COMPLETED YOUR FULL SERVICE.

Life outside of the Military can be overwhelming and confusing. However, there are a series of steps that can be taken to make this transition smoother and far more efficient. These are the steps that we'll explore throughout this course.

'Changing Step, A Guide To Successful Military Transitions' mainly focusses on the psychological aspects of re-entering civilian life. Because this transition isn't easy for anyone! By learning from someone who's 'been there, done that', you'll see the potential pitfalls, become less likely to make mistakes, and begin preparing yourself for a new fresh start.

By the end of the course you will:

  • Establish a New & Genuine Identity For Yourself Apart From Military.
  • Have a Stable Framework For Basing Your Future Decisions Upon.
  • Understand the Seven Essential Steps for Effective Military Transitions.
  • Become Aware of the Main Difficulties to Expect When Leaving the Military.
  • Become Confident of the Next Steps to Take in Your New Civilian Life.
  • Have Access to 24/7 Online Peer Support from the Course Instructor.


While it can only takes a day to hand back our ID cards and leave the Military, it can often take a lifetime for the Military to leave us. Many former servicemen are unaware of the common problems that can be faced inside of this transition. For many, these problems can come at the cost of their relationships, their physical health, their mental or emotional wellbeing, or even their personal finances.

So, whether you served your country for one day, or 22 years+, 'Changing Step: A Guide To Successful Military Transitions' will present you with a broad range of practical life principles, keys, and strategies for engaging more effectively in your new civilian life.

The course is partnered with a 100% Money back Guarantee within 30 days of purchase, and all course proceeds go directly towards Solid Grounds future efforts. Alternatively, the course is free to ALL ex-military personnel (please send me a direct message for a link).
title: Changing Step: A Guide To Successful Military Transitions
